snippet: Contrary to numerous articles and attempts to connect the dots, DaJuan Coleman is not related to the former Syracuse star Derrick Coleman.
abstract: Syracuse forward DaJuan Coleman is not related to former Syracuse star Derrick Coleman, contrary to numerous articles and attempts to connect the dots;  overwhelming similarities between the two are nothing more than a strange series of coincidences that continue to fool college basketball experts.
lead_paragraph: Contrary to numerous articles and attempts to connect the dots, DaJuan Coleman is not related to the former Syracuse star Derrick Coleman.

headline.seo: Syracuse’s DaJuan Coleman Is a Star by Any Name
headline.main: Having the Name but Not the Legacy
headline.print_headline: Having the Name But Not the Legacy
